tool_description: Find books by title, author, series, and reading complexity. Try the demo: [https://bookfinder-1-r7047837.deta.app](https://bookfinder-1-r7047837.deta.app/)
name: Book Finder
title: Book Finder

api_list.name: Find books
api_list.description: Search books using optional title, author, series, book type, categories, and [lexile measure](https://lexile.com/educators/understanding-lexile-measures/) range.

detail.msg: ensure this value has at least 2 characters
ensure this value has at least 2 characters

parameters.name: categories
parameters.description: Semicolon separated book categories to search for, e.g., 'Mystery & Suspense; Science Fiction & Fantasy'. Available categories include: ['Animals, Bugs & Pets', 'Art, Creativity & Music', 'General Literature', 'Hobbies, Sports & Outdoors', 'Science Fiction & Fantasy', 'Real Life', 'Science & Technology', 'Mystery & Suspense', 'Reference']

parameters.name: title
parameters.description: Terms to be appeared in book title.

utterances.utterance: Find me some fiction books by J.K. Rowling.
Show me books in the 'Science Fiction & Fantasy' category with a Lexile measure between 700 and 900.
I want to find nonfiction books about 'Real Life' with a Lexile measure no higher than 750.
Can you find books from the 'Wings of fire' series?
Search for books titled 'The Great Adventure' in the 'Mystery & Suspense' category.
Find books by George Orwell with a Lexile measure between 600 and 800.
Show me the first page of results for books in the 'Art, Creativity & Music' category.
I need a list of nonfiction books with a Lexile measure of at least 650.
Find books by Agatha Christie in the 'Mystery & Suspense' category.
Show me 10 results per page for books in the 'Science & Technology' category.
